description: Upload won't be a correction/revision. I plan to tab out the guitar soloing just after "Scatterbrain" intro from the Beck/Hammer Live album. He musically quotes some very old American and British folk songs I've heard before but can't quite know their name. Listen to the BBC sessions Jeff did with Middleton and Tench and in one of the songs he quotes "Mama's Little Baby Loves Shortnin' Bread."
title: Air Blower Scatterbrain
